info.title: sms77.io API
info.description: sms77.io Swagger API. Get your API-Key now at sms77.io.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about the Sms77.io SMS gateway.
Retrieve the status for a sent SMS with the given ID
Validate caller ID for voice Voice API
Issue voice call to phone number
Get number format, CNAM,- HLR- or MNP information for given phone number

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start date of the statistics in the format YYYY-MM-DD. By default, the date of 30 days ago is set.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End date of the statistics in the format YYYY-MM-DD. By default, the current day.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Shows only data of a specific label.

parameters.name: subaccounts
parameters.description: Receive the data only for the main account, all your (sub-)accounts or only for specific subaccounts.

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Defines the grouping of the data.

parameters.name: start
parameters.description: Start date of the statistics in the format YYYY-MM-DD. By default, the date of 30 days ago is set.

parameters.name: end
parameters.description: End date of the statistics in the format YYYY-MM-DD. By default, the current day.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: Shows only data of a specific label.

parameters.name: subaccounts
parameters.description: Receive the data only for the main account, all your (sub-)accounts or only for specific subaccounts.

parameters.name: group_by
parameters.description: Defines the grouping of the data.

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Determines the action to execute.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Defines whether to return the response as JSON or plain text (CSV).

parameters.name: action
parameters.description: Determines the action to execute.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Defines whether to return the response as JSON or plain text (CSV).

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Allowed values are "cnam", "format", "hlr" and "mnp".

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The phone number to look up.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Determines whether the response shall be returned in JSON format. Does not work with type "format".

success.description: Determines if the request was successful.,

international.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard.

international_formatted.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard in a human readable format.

number.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard in a human readable format.

national.description: The number in a domestic number format.

country_iso.description: The two digit ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

country_name.description: The full english name if the number belonging country.

country_code.description: The area code of the number belonging country. This value is numeric.

carrier.description: The (former) mobile carrier the number got issued to on initial number release.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Allowed values are "cnam", "format", "hlr" and "mnp".

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: The phone number to look up.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Determines whether the response shall be returned in JSON format. Does not work with type "format".

success.description: Determines if the request was successful.,

international.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard.

international_formatted.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard in a human readable format.

number.description: The number formatted accordingly to the E.164 standard in a human readable format.

national.description: The number in a domestic number format.

country_iso.description: The two digit ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.

country_name.description: The full english name if the number belonging country.

country_code.description: The area code of the number belonging country. This value is numeric.

carrier.description: The (former) mobile carrier the number got issued to on initial number release.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The countries ISO code to get pricings for. Allowed values are de, fr, at. Omit to show pricings for all channels.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Determines the response format. Allowed values are json and csv. The default value is json.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Sets the SMS type to get pricings for. Allowed values are "direct" and "economy". The default value is "direct".

countCountries.description: The number if countries in total.

comment.description: Any information which might be of interest.

features.description: The features supported by this network.

networkName.description: The full name of the carrier.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: The countries ISO code to get pricings for. Allowed values are de, fr, at. Omit to show pricings for all channels.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Determines the response format. Allowed values are json and csv. The default value is json.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Sets the SMS type to get pricings for. Allowed values are "direct" and "economy". The default value is "direct".

countCountries.description: The number if countries in total.

comment.description: Any information which might be of interest.

features.description: The features supported by this network.

networkName.description: The full name of the carrier.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The actual text message to send.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: The recipient number or group name.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Set a cusotm sender name.

parameters.name: foreign_id
parameters.description: Identifer to return in callbacks.

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: A custom label.

parameters.name: udh
parameters.description: A custom User Data Header.

parameters.name: delay
parameters.description: Date/Time for delayed dispatch.

parameters.name: debug
parameters.description: Disable message sending.

parameters.name: no_reload
parameters.description: Enable sending of duplicated messages within 180 seconds.

parameters.name: unicode
parameters.description: Force unicode encoding. Reduces sms length to 70 chars.

parameters.name: flash
parameters.description: Send as flash.

parameters.name: utf8
parameters.description: Force UTF8 encoding.

parameters.name: details
parameters.description: Attach message details to response.

parameters.name: return_msg_id
parameters.description: Attach message ID to second row in a text response.

parameters.name: json
parameters.description: Return a detailed JSON response.

parameters.name: performance_tracking
parameters.description: Enable performance tracking for found URLs.

parameters.name: msg_id
parameters.description: The ID from the SMS.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Determines the recipient. Can only be a number, not a contact from your address book.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback URL which gets queried right after validation.

parameters.name: number
parameters.description: Determines the recipient. Can only be a number, not a contact from your address book.

parameters.name: callback
parameters.description: The callback URL which gets queried right after validation.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Determines the receiver. Must be a valid phone number or contact from the address book.

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: The text to convert to a voice message. Accepts valid XML too.

parameters.name: xml
parameters.description: Decides whetherthe parameter "text" is plain text or XML. The default value is 0.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Sets the sender. Must be a verificated sender. Use an inbound number of yours or one of ours.
